title: Borderline
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Good people do bad things too
Pretend they don't know but they do
It takes one to know your mind
You and me, we are one of a kind, it's true
[Pre-Chorus]
I like to my feel my bones when they crash into my heart
I like to taste the blood when you're tearin' me apart
And though I won't resist your touch you got me losing my mind
Borderline, hey
[Chorus]
Tonight, for the rest of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds lovе in crazy too
Borderline
Tonight, for the rеst of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds love in crazy too
Borderline

[Verse 2]
Wrapped in the rhythm with you
A pretty disguise from the truth
Hand in hand we go to the unknown
Promise to chase the rush 'til we're dead and gone
[Pre-Chorus]
I like to my feel my bones when they crash into my heart
I like to taste the blood when you're tearin' me apart
And though I won't resist your touch you got me losing my mind
Borderline, hey
[Chorus]
Tonight, for the rest of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds love in crazy too
Borderline
Tonight, for the rest of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds love in crazy too
Borderline

[Bridge]
Stay with me, and you'll never be stranded in calm waters
Stay with me, and I promise you not a day of boredom
[Chorus]
Tonight, for the rest of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds love in crazy too
Borderline
Tonight, for the rest of my life
I'm gonna be stuck on you
You're wrong but you're feeling so right (Feel so, feel so)
No other love felt like you
Your madness bringing out mine
Crazy finds love in crazy too
Borderline
[Outro]
Borderline (Borderline)
Oh yeah, yeah (Borderline)
